meaningMnemonic: A <radical>spirit</radical> loses its <radical>skin</radical> as a part of the damage it <kanji>incur</kanji>s after death. That's why the spirit goes on looking for new skin to <kanji>cover</kanji> itself with.
readingMnemonic: When you <kanji>incur</kanji> the wrath of an angry spirit it'll try to <kanji>cover</kanji> itself with your skin, and you'll feel your skin <reading>he</reading>at (ひ) up.
